page.title: 11DENESIDE SCHOOL,SEAHAM
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS DENESIDE JUNIOR SCHOOL. BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS FROM 7YRS-11YRS OLD ATTEND THE SCHOOL.WE HAVE EIGHT CLASSES,A LIBRARY,A RESOURCES ROOM, TWO READING ROOMS AND A SWIMMING POOL. OTHER SCHOOLS ALSO USE THE POOL.WE HAVE A HEADMASTER AND NINE FULL TIME STAFF.TWO MORE STAFF ARE EMPLOYED PART-TIME TO HELP WITH THE SLOWER READERS.WE HAVE ACROSSING PATROL LADY AND A CARETAKER WHO IS IN CHARGE OF SIX CLEANERS.THE SCHOOL IS CLEANED EVERY EVENING.KITCHEN STAFF MAKE THE SCHOOL DINNNERS WHICH ARE SERVED AT 12 O CLOCK EACH DAY.A WOODWIND TEACHER AND A GUITAR TEACHER COME FOR A SHORT TIME EACH WEAK TO TAKE A SMALL GROUP OF CHILDREN.A SWIMMING INSTRUCTRESS TAKES ALL SWIMMING LESSONS.IN JULY 1985 WE HAVE 126 BOYS AND 89 GIRLS IN OUR SCHOOL.THE HEADMASTER MANAGES THE SCHOOL AND GOVERNORS EMPLOY PEOPLE.
